## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing
- [ ] Code follows TypeScript and linting standards
- [ ] No emojis in production code (allowed in documentation)
- [ ] Documentation updated for user-facing changes

### SBEP Compliance
- [ ] Changes maintain SBEP protocol compliance
- [ ] Governance validation passes (`npm run validate`)
- [ ] Version manifest updated if needed
- [ ] Exception policies followed for edge cases

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Integration tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Performance impact assessed

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] API documentation updated for new features
- [ ] Changelog entry added for user-facing changes
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
